TextLibrary.Text: The old man insists that the Luminary Archive orbits the Icarus Alpha Moon in the Icarus System. He says it is cloaked but we should be able to scan for it now that we know it's there.
The old man insists that the Luminary Archive orbits the Icarus Alpha Moon in the Icarus System. He says it is cloaked but we should be able to scan for it now that we know it's there.
It sounds dubious, and that system is full of Pirates.
It sounds dubious, and that system is full of Pirates.
That was all he had to say.
That was all he had to say.
